entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 12:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: ESE 19 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to snow at times heavy this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 near midnight then northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
